amendment.description: To prohibit or suspend certain health care providers from providing non-Department of Veterans Affairs health care services to veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 904 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 904 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5789) To prohibit or suspend certain health care providers from providing non-Department of Veterans Affairs health care services to veterans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 904 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 904 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 1003.
